education.descricao: Focus on management, strategy, and business analysis, developing skills in communication, decision-making, and problem-solving.
Training focused on digital product design, exploring discovery, definition, ideation, prototyping, and validation processes, with a user-centered approach aligned with business goals.

education.titulo: Postgraduate Lato Sensu in UX Design
education.descricao: Specialization focused on developing projects for physical, digital, and hybrid environments, applying principles of user-centered design, information architecture, usability, and prototyping.
